lang.lang_choose_prompt: The language to be switched is: {lang}
lang.lang_select_msg: The list to choose from is:{list}

error.lang_command_other_error: There is an error in the language switching processor. Please check the log information for details.
error.lang_command_user_error: The language switching failed, please try again later.
error.user_prompt: Oops, there was an error, please contact {user} and describe the problem.
error.err_get_filelink: There was an error in getting the address of the file {fileId}, skip...

newpack.tasklocked: You currently have a running task. Please wait until the task is completed.
newpack.taskexist: You currently have a collection queue. Please end it first with the finish command. Send any text to get help.
newpack.newpack: All right, when you're ready, send me an emoji or emoji link now! (up to {max})

nosticker: Sorry, but there is no expression in your collection queue. Maybe the robot has restarted, or you haven't sent an emoji yet? Often use the newpack command to start.

downloadstep.sending: [4/4] Sending a zip package, which may take a little time - rest, take a break!
